summary: "Hannah Montana" was a popular Disney Channel show that ran from 2006 to 2011. It starred Miley Cyrus as Miley Stewart, a teen with a secret life as a pop star named Hannah Montana. She wore a wig to hide her identity and tried to balance her normal life with her famous one. The show was about family, friends, and finding yourself. It led to a movie and a concert film. Even though critics didn't love it, the show was a big hit and helped make Miley Cyrus a famous singer and actress.
title: Hannah Montana
